import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import linearGradient from"assets/theme/functions/linearGradient";// Vision UI Dashboard PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var borderWidth=borders.borderWidth;var lg=boxShadows.lg;var size=typography.size;var text=colors.text,white=colors.white,borderCol=colors.borderCol,gradients=colors.gradients,transparent=colors.transparent;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;export default{defaultProps:{disableAutoFocusItem:true},styleOverrides:{"& .MuiIcon-root":{stroke:white.main},paper:{minWidth:pxToRem(160),boxShadow:lg,padding:"0 !important",fontSize:size.sm,color:white.main,textAlign:"left",border:"".concat(borderWidth[1]," solid ").concat(borderCol.navbar),borderRadius:borderRadius.md},list:{background:linearGradient(gradients.menu.main,gradients.menu.state,gradients.menu.deg),"& .MuiMenuItem-root":{"& .MuiBox-root .MuiTypography-root":{color:white.main},"&:hover":{background:transparent.main}}}}};
